text: Abdoulaye Idrissa Maïga (born 11 March 1958) is a Malian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Mali from 8 April 2017 to 29 December 2017. Previously, he was Minister of Defence since 3 September 2016. He is a member of the Rally for Mali. == References == Category:1958 births Category:Prime ministers of Mali Category:Living people
title: Abdoulaye Idrissa Maïga
